channel.title: Quick Reference :: Rbcli Documentation
channel.description: Installation Rbcli is available on rubygems.org. You can add it to your applicationâ€™s Gemfile or gemspec: spec.add_dependency 'rbcli', '~> 0.4'Or install it manually by running: gem install rbcliStarting a Project Rbcli includes a tool to quickly create either a gem or a portable executable. Creating either is simple. rbcli gem mytoolrbcli portable mytool rbcli portable -a mytool # Adds annotationsOr you can DIY #!/usr/bin/env ruby require 'rbcli' Rbcli::Configurate.cli do appname 'mytool' version '0.
